comments.body:
UX review on AWS is ready at:

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/889
@kamal has already done the code review for this branch.

* vpc network label missing bubble help
* vpc subnet label does not match wireframe
* vpc subnet has weird select some options text, please remove
* vpc options not in summary area, does not match wireframe

The issues from the UX review have been addressed.

The pull request is re-opened at:

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/889
The branch is also linked to GUI-1232, which haven't worked on yet.

The pull request for UX review is re-opened at:
https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/889
UX review passed, ready for code review
Punting back for PEP8, XHTML, and code clarity fixes -- see comments in pull request 889.

The pull request has been updated:

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/889
Punting back to correct the PEP8 violations (again)

The pull request has been updated:
https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/889
Punting back to fix a duplicate code issue
The duplicated code issue has been addressed.
[~kyolee]: https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/889 looks good to merge once Jenkins passes.  Feel free to ping me after it passes and you've merged this so I can move it to QA.
The pull request has been merged after passing the automated test. Ready to move to QA.
